version_description:
* Support for iOS 13 Dark Mode
* Price drop notifications are now delivered reliably
* App thumbnails are loaded faster

* Added support for Spanish, German, Chinese and Greek languages!
* Fixed a minor issue with the search bar when no results were available.
* Minor fixes to the tutorial.

Bug fixes and performance improvements
---
We have fixed a number of crash related bugs regarding iCloud syncing and we have also improved the performance by completely revamping the way app icons are stored and synced.

'Already added' alert
---
An alert is now presented when you try to add an already added app.

- Thanks James!

URL scheme support
---
Supports adding apps via the wshlst:// URL scheme (e.g. wshlst://id953813916 or wshlst://778576249)

- Thanks Tim!

Price locale setting
---
You can now override the automatic price locale to use a different one. This option is synced across all of your iOS devices.

- Thanks Võ!

GDPR tools
---
Options to download or delete all of your WSH LST data have been added.

In compliance with the 'Right of access' and 'Right to erasure' of GDPR, we have implemented ways to download all of your WSH LST data and also remove them if you so desire.

* Vastly improves the scrolling experience when browsing through your list.
* Improves performance under low memory situations.
* Extension list now refreshes automatically with price locale changes. (Thanks Yaron!)
* Only the supported locales are now shown in the Settings menu.
* Fixes small issues regarding app loading.
* The list is now updated if the price locale has been changed remotely.
* Improved how the prices are displayed in the list.

* Fixes an issue that was preventing the price change indicator from being shown.
* Fixes a crashing issue happening when an app wasn't found.
* Country list in Price Locale option is now properly sorted in alphabetical order.

* Adds "Add to Wishlist" option in the share option in the home screen. (Thanks Ainy!)
* Improves app behavior on errors, by not crashing on certain undefined states.
* Fixes an edge case issue regarding data deletion request in sibling devices.
* Several bug fixes.
Fixes the 'App is not available' issue
The "Add to Wishlist" button is now also shown in App Store stories!
Adds an option in Settings to import your previously exported WSH LST apps!

Fixes more of those pesky "App is not available" issues. We are really sorry about that!

(Thanks Dirk for letting us know!)

- Price drop notifications!

This feature was on our roadmap since day one but required a lot of love and attention to be implemented properly.

Starting from this version, you can subscribe to Price drop notifications right within the app and be alerted once one or more of your added apps is discounted!

- Bug fixes and performance optimizations

We have fixed a number of reported (and non-reported) issues in WSH LST. The app also now updates the app prices even faster!

- Data Management

Settings now host a separate category that deal with your data, you can import, export or delete your WSH LST data with just one tap!

- View last update time

Curious when the last update to your WSH LST library has taken place? Just pull down to reveal the last update time!

• Fixed an issue regarding users trying to purchase the subscription while having outdated receipts in their devices.
• Fixed a rare crash when purchasing the price drop notification subscription.
• The price increase indicator is back!

New on 1.8

- Price drop notifications!

This feature was on our roadmap since day one but required a lot of love and attention to be implemented properly.

Starting from this version, you can subscribe to Price drop notifications right within the app and be alerted once one or more of your added apps is discounted!

• Fixed rare crash on price drop notification.

- New on 1.8

Price drop notifications!

This feature was on our roadmap since day one but required a lot of love and attention to be implemented properly.

Starting from this version, you can subscribe to Price drop notifications right within the app and be alerted once one or more of your added apps is discounted!

* Fixes an issue where apps were not able to be added from the extension.
* Price drop notifications are now delivered reliably.
* WSH LST application list now updates correctly when an app is already added.
* Subscription button can now be dismissed.
* Discounts view is always visible but obscured when there's no active subscription.

* Support for iOS 13 Dark Mode
* Price drop notifications are now delivered reliably
* App thumbnails are loaded faster

* Stability improvements.
* App Store stories are now parsed properly.
* Application list is properly updated when user's iCloud account is connected.
* Improves behavior in different appearances (Light, Dark).
* App icons are now generated consistently.
* Fixes issue where apps may appear multiple times.
* Fixes issue where deleting all data would lead to an invalid state.
* Improves behavior during subscription purchasing.
* App notifications are now delivered consistently.
* Fixes issue where apps were not showing up in the Share extension.
* Fixes several critical bugs that were leading to crash.
* Performance improvements.
